## VariableMap.deleteVariable() method

Delete a variable and all of its uses without confirmation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
deleteVariable(variable: IVariableModel<IVariableState>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  variable | [IVariableModel](./blockly.ivariablemodel.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IVariableState](./blockly.ivariablestate.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Variable to delete. |

**Returns:**

void
